com.cardconnect.consumersdk.domain

Class CCConsumerCardInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cardconnect.consumersdk.domain.CCConsumerCardInfo

  • public class CCConsumerCardInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents card information data. Provides specific information needed for tokenization CCConsumerApi.generateAccountForCard(CCConsumerCardInfo, CCConsumerTokenCallback) this object can be populated either through CCConsumerCreditCardNumberEditText.setCardNumberOnCardInfo(CCConsumerCardInfo) or manually, if used manually user must set real card number on setCardNumber(String) and desired masked options in case using getCardNumber().

      • getCCConsumerCardMaskSpacing

        @NonNull
public CCConsumerCardMaskSpacing getCCConsumerCardMaskSpacing()
        Gets CCConsumerCardMaskSpacing current spacing option that this component is using. This will be CCConsumerCardMaskSpacing.CARD_MASK_SPACING_EVERY_FOUR by default if not provided.
        Returns:
        CCConsumerCardMaskSpacing enumeration object.

      • setCCConsumerCardMaskSpacing

        public void setCCConsumerCardMaskSpacing(@NonNull
                                         CCConsumerCardMaskSpacing consumerCardMaskSpacing)
        Sets CCConsumerCardMaskSpacing current spacing option object to format the text with.
        Parameters:
        consumerCardMaskSpacing - CCConsumerCardMaskSpacing spacing format option.

      • getCCConsumerExpirationDateSeparator

        @NonNull
public CCConsumerExpirationDateSeparator getCCConsumerExpirationDateSeparator()
        Gets CCConsumerExpirationDateSeparator current option that this component is using for expiration date. This will be CCConsumerExpirationDateSeparator.SLASH by default if not provided.
        Returns:
        CCConsumerMaskFormat enumeration object.

      • getCCConsumerMaskFormat

        @NonNull
public CCConsumerMaskFormat getCCConsumerMaskFormat()
        Gets CCConsumerMaskFormat current mask option that this component is using. This will be CCConsumerMaskFormat.CARD_MASK_LAST_FOUR by default if not provided.
        Returns:
        CCConsumerMaskFormat enumeration object.

      • getMaskCharacter

        public char getMaskCharacter()
        Current mask character defined for the card number. This will be '*' by default if not provided.

      • setMaskCharacter

        public void setMaskCharacter(char maskCharacter)
        Sets current mask char character for the card number.

      • getCardNumber

        @Nullable
public java.lang.String getCardNumber()
        Returns masked number according to mCCConsumerMaskFormat and mMaskCharacter defined on this object.
        Returns:
        String object representation of the masked number.

      • setCardNumber

        public void setCardNumber(@Nullable
                          java.lang.String cardNumber)
        Sets real card number this must not be masked, if using CCConsumerCreditCardNumberEditText.setCardNumberOnCardInfo(CCConsumerCardInfo) this method will be invoked to populate card number with unmasked number representation.

        public boolean isCardValid()
        Returns a full validation of the card object information: card number, expiration date and cvv.
        Returns:
        true if CCConsumerCardInfo object information is valid false otherwise.
